Paragraph: Alfentanil 50 micrograms kg - 1 effectively inhibits the incidence and intensity of suxamethonium - induced muscle fasciculations ; moreover , intragastric pressure remains at its control value .

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Alfentanil |
| Suxamethonium |

In this paragraph, "Alfentanil" is explicitly mentioned as a chemical entity. "Suxamethonium" is also mentioned as a chemical entity based on context, as it is the cause of muscle fasciculations.
